title: SAP Fiori Patterns
name: SAP Fiori Patterns
description: Fiori Elements annotations, UI patterns, and best practices for Fiori app development

axiomAlignment.A1_verifiability: Annotations and Page Map editor enable reproducible UI configuration and testing
axiomAlignment.A2_user_primacy: Design patterns prioritize user intent with value helps, field groups, and intuitive layouts
axiomAlignment.A3_transparency: Explicit annotations document UI behavior and field bindings
axiomAlignment.A4_non_harm: Draft handling, validation, and proper error display protect user data
axiomAlignment.A5_consistency: Unified List Report, Object Page, and Worklist patterns across Fiori apps

fiori-list-report.name: List Report Pattern
fiori-list-report.description: Standard list report with filtering, sorting, and search

best_practices: Organize fields into facets and field groups
Set proper positions for field ordering

fiori-worklist.name: Worklist Pattern
best_practices: Use status indicators for task status

fiori-criticality.name: Criticality Pattern

code.cds:
@EndUserText.label: 'Status Criticality'
case
  when Status = 'A' then 3
  when Status = 'P' then 2
  when Status = 'C' then 1
  else 0
end as StatusCriticality
